lemma SAStates_ChiPlus_ChiRel_NoCycle_1 [rule_format]: "\<lbrakk> (S,U) \<in> ChiPlus A; SA \<in> SAs A \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (U,T) \<in> (ChiRel A) \<longrightarrow> S \<in> States SA \<longrightarrow> T \<in> States SA \<longrightarrow> (insert S (insert U ({V. (S,V) \<in> ChiPlus A \<and> (V,U) \<in> ChiPlus A}))) \<inter> (ChiRel A `` {U}) \<noteq> {}"
